definition: disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration

sentences.english: The great mass of trucks and vehicles, the counter streams of hurrying pedestrians, seemed like a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 川流不息的車輛，匆匆來去的行人，象一個迷陣似的。

definition: lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
lit. to kill the chicken to get the eggs (idiom)/fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
out of ammunition and no food left (idiom); in desperate straits
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
(of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)
each sticks to his own version (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
